headline: CLEANROOM SYSTEMS ADVANCAIR ENVIRONMENTAL CONTROL UNIT
description: Environmental Control Unit   The AdvancAir is an air-conditioning control system that monitors and automatically conditions the air for a wide range of cleanroom applications. The ECU (environmental contol unit) provides control over the temperature and humidity within the enclosure as well as providing amine filtration.
categories.lvl1: Semiconductor Manufacturing Equipment > Semiconductor Manufacturing Facilities Equipment
categories.lvl2: Semiconductor Manufacturing Equipment  >  Semiconductor Manufacturing Facilities Equipment > Other Semiconductor Facilities Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Cleanroom Systems
Model AdvancAir ECU 261
Description Airconditioning Control Unit with Amine Filtration
Other Information Temperature Control Spec: 20-23ºC, ±0.2ºC
Humidity Control Spec: 40-50 ± 1.0% RH
Refrigeration compressor capacity: 28,900 BTUH
Condition Like New
Year of Manufacture 2007
Power Requirements 460 V 25.0 A 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
CE Marked YES
